entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
